lead_paragraph: The historic Fondaco dei Tedeschi along the Grand Canal has been remodeled as a lifestyle department store, operated by the duty-free retailer DFS.

headline.print_headline: Duty-Free Giant Lands at New Gate
headline.main: In Venice, Duty-Free Shopping Takes on a Whole New Look

snippet: The historic Fondaco dei Tedeschi along the Grand Canal has been remodeled as a lifestyle department store, operated by the duty-free retailer DFS....
